item.title: The Answer of Practice 1-2
item.description: 問2 $$ 事象 A_1, A_2, A_3 に対して次の等式を示せ.\\ P(A \cup B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A \cap B) \quad より \\ \begin{align} P(A_1 \cup (A_2 \cup A_3)) &= P(A_1) + P(A_2 \cup A_3) - P(A_1 \cap (A_2 \cup A_3)) \\ &= P(A_1) + P(A_2) + P(A_3) - P(A_2 \cap A_3) - P(A_1 \cap (A_2 \cup A_3)) \\ &= P(A_1) + P(A_2) + P(A_3) - P(A_2 \cap A_3) - (P(A_1 \cap A_3) + P(A_1 \cap A_2) - P(A_1 \cap A_2 \cap A_3)) \\
